Title: Marketing Positioning Case Study: Why "Expertise" Claims Fall Short...
Content: However, this marketing positioning case study reveals why expertise-based positioning consistently underperforms in competitive situations. Features vs . Benefits: The Foundation of Effective Positioning .

Title: TradingView — Track All Markets
Content: Where the world charts, chats, and trades markets . We're a supercharged super-charting platform and social network for traders and investors. Free to sign up.
Source: https://www.tradingview.com/

COMPETITOR ANALYSIS 3:
Title: What is Time to Market KPIs and How to Measure Them - growett
Content: 9. Analyzing Time to Market Trends and Patterns.• Competitive advantage : Products launched quickly gain a competitive edge over slower-to- market competitors . •Increased revenue: Faster Time to Market allows for quicker return on investment (ROI) and revenue growth .
Source: https://growett.com/blogs/What-is-Time-to-Market-KPIs-and-How-to-Measure-Them

COMPETITOR ANALYSIS 4:
Title: The Role Of Strategic Planning On Business Growth On Technical...
Content: Business growth helps to increase market shares , increase revenue, attract better talents.The study relates small business growth with strategic planning where financial performance, market shares , sales , and return on investment is used to measure the growth (Mazarrow 2009).
Source: https://project-house.net/role-of-strategic-planning-on-business-growth-on-technical-companies-in-the-buea-municipality/
